data.Name: Administrative
data.Description: A reservoir delineated by administrative criteria such as lease or royalty conditions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Carbon Storage
data.Description: A subsurface geological formation suitable for the injection and long-term storage of captured Carbon dioxide.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Conventional
data.Description: A reservoir that can be exploited without complex treatments or production technologies. A reservoir of natural permeability with hydrocarbons constrained by an impermeable caprock.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Mineable
data.Description: A reservoir amenable to surface extraction.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unassessed
data.Description: A reservoir that has not yet been delineated by geological or technical analysis
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unconventional
data.Description: A reservoir with flow characteristics requiring non-traditional exploitation technologies. The criteria for unconventional evolve over time as technologies and economics change. Unconventional reservoirs typically have extremely low permeability and basin-scale extent.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Geologic
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="Unassessed" with Name="Unassessed" instead. Reservoir defined per Geological Definition Objective
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Oil Sands Deposit
data.Description: Reject this - could be conventional, unconv or mineable.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
